design just below the chest at the top of my bump have long waist and extremely large boobs 34dd pre pregnancy 36 when pregnant nursing even when am not pregnant have hard time finding shirts that fit because of how big my boobs are can get away with wearing non maternity shirts through the end of pregnancy because if it fits up top there is lot of extra fabric around my middle my favorite tops are easily pulled down or unbuttoned for nursing baby belly poking out of the bottom of shirts was never big issue for me despite my long waist because of the pants wore my favorite pants looked and fit
